  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CustomItemList
CustomItemList class is an ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of HouseholdItem objects in a custom layout.
FilterItems
This class contains the functions for filtering list of items based on a few different parameters.
FiltersFragment
A DialogFragment class representing the Filters fragment that pops up when the Filter button is clicked on the Main Screen.
FiltersFragment.FiltersFragmentListener
Interface for communicating filter actions to the hosting activity.
HouseholdItem
This is the class that represents an item in the household inventory
ItemEditActivity
The ItemEditActivity class represents the activity for adding or editing household items.
ListActivity
The ListActivity class represents the activity for displaying a list of household items.
LoginActivity
LoginActivity class represents the activity for user login.
MainActivity
The MainActivity class represents the main activity of the application
PhotoAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of images in a RecyclerView.
PhotoAdapter.OnDeleteClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a photo is deleted.
PhotoPickerFragment
A Fragment to pick photos from the device's gallery or capture photos using the camera.
ScannerFragment
A fragment that allows capturing images using the device camera and performing OCR or barcode scanning on the captured images.
ScannerFragment.OnSerialNumberCapturedListener
Interface for capturing serial numbers.
SelectedItemAdapter
SelectedItemAdapter class is an ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of selected HouseholdItem objects in a custom layout with checkboxes (thus differing from CustomItemList).
SelectedItemAdapter.OnItemCheckedChangeListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the checked state of an item changes.
SortFragment
This is a class that sorts the items in ascending or descending order by date, description, make, and value
SortFragment.SortListener
Interface for notifying listeners about sorted data.
TagDefineFragment
The TagDefineFragment class represents a dialog fragment for defining and adding new tags.
TagDefineFragment.TagsOnFragmentInteractionListener
Interface for communication between the TagDefineFragment and its hosting activity.
TagsAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for managing and displaying tags with checkboxes.
TagsAdapter.OnCheckboxCheckedChangeListener
Interface for handling checkbox change events.
TagsAdapter.onTagCheckedChangeListener
Interface for handling tag checked change events.
TagSelectFragment
A DialogFragment for selecting tags from a list.
TagSelectFragment.OnTagsSelectedListener
Interface to communicate the selected tags back to the calling fragment/activity.
TagsManager
The `TagsManager` class handles interactions with Firebase Firestore for managing tags.
TagsManager.CallbackHandler<T>
Callback interface for handling asynchronous results or failures.
TagsViewActivity
The `TagsViewActivity` class represents the activity for viewing and managing tags.
